basics.name: Seok-Hyung Lee (이석형)
basics.label: Quantum theory physicist
basics.summary: A Korean theoretical physicist specialising in quantum information and computing, with a focus on quantum error correction.

work.name: Centre for Engineered Quantum Systems, University of Sydney
work.summary: Principal Investigator: Prof. Stephen D. Bartlett

education.institution: Department of Physics and Astronomy, Seoul National University
education.area: Center for Macroscopic Quantum Control (CMQC), supervised by Prof. Hyunseok Jeong
